Authors and Citation

Authors

  • James Joseph Balamuta. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

  • Dirk Eddelbuettel. Author, copyright holder.

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Balamuta, J.J. and Eddelbuettel, D. (2018) RcppEnsmallen: Header-Only C++ Mathematical Optimization Library for 'Armadillo'. URL https://cran.r-project.org/package=RcppEnsmallen.

@Manual{,
  title = {{RcppEnsmallen: Header-Only C++ Mathematical Optimization Library for 'Armadillo'}},
  author = {James Joseph Balamuta and Dirk Eddelbuettel},
  year = {2018},
}

S. Bhardwaj, R. Curtin, M. Edel, Y. Mentekidis, and C. Sanderson (2018). ensmallen: a flexible C++ library for efficient function optimization. Workshop on Systems for ML and Open Source Software at NIPS 2018. URL http://www.ensmallen.org/files/ensmallen_2018.pdf.

@Article{,
  title = {{ensmallen: a flexible C++ library for efficient function optimization}},
  author = {Shikhar Bhardwaj and Ryan R. Curtin and Marcus Edel and Yannis Mentekidis and Conrad Sanderson},
  journal = {Workshop on Systems for ML and Open Source Software at NIPS},
  year = {2018},
  month = {dec},
}

Additional details

      

    

    

      
Additional details

      
The RcppEnsmallen package provides an integration of Ensmallen and its dependences

    

    

      
Additional details

      
into R. RcppEnsmallen accomplishes this by linking into RcppArmadillo,

    

    

      
Additional details

      
establishing plugins, examples, and more. The R implementation was done by James

    

    

      
Additional details

      
Joseph Balamuta and Dirk Eddelbuettel with additional contributions by

    

    

      
Additional details

      
contributors listed in the ChangeLog.
